Package oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows

Class PassageEditorWindow

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows.GenericEditorWindow
oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows.PassageEditorWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditorWindowInterface
public class PassageEditorWindow extends GenericEditorWindow
A class that basically is a window that allows a user to edit an EditablePassage (and indirectly edit the other passages it's linked to)

  • Method Details

    • makeTheFrame

      void makeTheFrame()
      Sets up the JFrame with all the stuff that needs to be put into the panel.
      Specified by:
      makeTheFrame in class GenericEditorWindow

    • imDone

      void imDone​(ActionEvent e)
      A method to be called by the 'exit' button in the 'done' panel. Basically saves any unsaved changes, and closes the window. But if the changes don't succeed, we won't close the window, so the author can fix the problems (and won't lose their stuff)
      Specified by:
      imDone in class GenericEditorWindow
      Parameters:
      e - an actionEvent to allow this to be used as a lambda.

    • updateName

      private void updateName​(ActionEvent e)
      This method attempts to update the passageName of thePassage (and any references to it)
      Parameters:
      e - is here so I can use this as a lambda.

    • updateName

      private boolean updateName​(boolean complainIfUnchanged)
      This method attempts to update the passageName of thePassage (and any references to it)
      Parameters:
      complainIfUnchanged - if true, we check if the passage name was unchanged, and, if the user re-submitted the existing passage name, we complain.
      Returns:
      true if it could be updated, false otherwise

    • updateTags
